class.name: VaultHunter.EXE
class.description: 主动技. 按 [LB/L1/F] to run your VaultHunter.EXE program. It will analyze the situation, determine which Vault Hunter would do the best job,和then load an ACTION PACKAGE allowing Claptrap to fight in that manner for a short 每iod of time. It also gives you Full 生命值和生命恢复. VaultHunter.EXE is still in beta和its definition of ''Vault Hunter'' is questionable at best. Warning: VaultHunter.EXE is currently classified as malware. Your allies may be affected.

stats.name: 恢复 2.5% 最大生命值/秒.

skills.name: All the Guns
skills.description:
Gun Subroutines. You randomly pick a Subroutine focused on a gun type, making you more effective with that gun type, but less effective with all others.
Upon selecting a Subroutine you gain 100 Frag层数, which decrease over time. When you run out of Frag层数, your Subroutine will be replaced with a new one.

skills.name: Fuzzy Logic
skills.description: Taking伤害 from an 敌人增加暴击伤害 for a few 秒.

skills.name: Safety First
skills.description: Defensive Subroutines. You randomly pick a Subroutine focused on either 生命值 or 护盾s, which grants increased 容量和恢复 for the chosen attribute. The catch? You deal reduced伤害 with 所有枪械类型. Upon selecting a Subroutine you gain 100 Frag层数, which decrease over time. When you run out of Frag层数, your Subroutine will be replaced with a new one.

stats.name: 恢复 2.5% of Max Attribute / sec

skills.name: Surprised? Stabilize!
skills.description: Taking伤害 from an 敌人 增加your 精准度和减少后坐力 with all guns for a few 秒.

skills.description: 近战 Subroutine. You randomly pick a 近战-focused Subroutine, which grants you a massive 近战伤害 加成 but reduces your伤害 with guns.

skills.description: 增加枪械伤害, 射速,和装填速度 while in 跪地状态. Also, 增加the 持续时间 of 跪地状态.

skills.name: Tripleclocked
skills.description: Multiplies the 加成es和Penalties of the current Subroutine by 最多 three. The fewer Frag层数 you have, the greater the multiplier. Defensive Subroutines always receive Triple 容量 regardless of层数. Also, unlocks ACTION PACKAGE One Shot Wonder.

stats.name: One Shot Wonder: Every shot empties all bullets from your clip.

skills.name: Grenade Vent
skills.description: 增加Grenade伤害. Also, throwing a grenade adds Frag层数.

skills.name: Element of Surprise
skills.description: 元素Subroutines. You randomly pick a Subroutine that 增加伤害 with a chosen element, but Decreases伤害 with all other elements. Upon depleting your 护盾, filling your 护盾, or entering 跪地状态, you release a Nova of the chosen element.

skills.name: Death Machine
skills.description: 击杀技. 击杀敌人增加your 枪械伤害, 装填速度,和移动速度 for a few 秒.

skills.name: Cryogenic Exhaust Manifold
skills.description: Whenever you 震击, you release a Cryo Nova和lose some Frag层数.

skills.description: 增加近战伤害. Also, 击杀敌人with a 近战 grants Frag层数, a small amount of 生命值,和increased 移动速度 for a few 秒.

stats.name: Frag层数 on 近战 Kill: +[$]

skills.name: Rainbow Coolant
skills.description: Whenever you initiate a new Subroutine you emit a Rainbow Nova. The Nova consists of all elements, humongous in size,和makes your team su每 happy. Also, unlocks ACTION PACKAGE Laser Inferno.

stats.name: Laser Inferno: Shoot 激光 in all directions at nearby 敌人.

skills.name: Best Buds 4 Life
skills.description: Whenever you're revived or you revive someone, you和your buddy gain 生命恢复和伤害 Reduction for a short time. Also, extends 跪地状态和增加武器伤害 while downed.

stats.name: 生命值 Regen: +[$]% of Max 生命值 / sec.

skills.name: Maniacal Laughter
skills.description: 增加Status Effect 几率. Dealing Status Effect伤害 to 敌人 grants层数 of Maniacal Laughter. You和your pals gain 生命恢复 for each层数 of Maniacal Laughter. The lower your 生命值, the greater the 生命恢复. Each层数 lasts a few 秒.

stats.name: 恢复 最多 [$]% of your Max 生命值每层 每 秒.

Max 生命值 每 Teammate: +[$]%

stats.name: Friendship Nova: Heals 最多 15% of your Max 生命值.
Gun Wizard: You和all allies gain drastically increased 射速和装填速度.

skills.name: Wax Off, Wax On

skills.name: It's a Trap... Card

stats.name: Mega-Nova: Heals 最多 15% of your Max 生命值.

skills.name: Pain Simulator is Painful
skills.description: 增加your Max 生命值和grants a small amount of 伤害 Reduction.

skills.name: Kick Him While He's Up

护盾 Cost: 最多 [$]% of Max 护盾s
